bookSourceComment:
By_聆听月与悦 . 25.5.4
+可以试着点击右上角修改源变量中的action值可更换服务器
+注意填到""中

+服务器地址：
=>qbmfxs.com
=>1qxs.com
=>1qxs.com
=>2vdu.com
=>0xs.net
=>goboo.cc
header:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = 
  	{
    "action": ""
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
      source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
      java.toast("请按照规则修改源变量，已重置源变量！")
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
    source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
  }
</js>

By_聆听月与悦 . 25.5.4
+点击右上角修改源变量中的action值可更换服务器
+注意填到""中

+服务器地址：
=>qbmfxs.com

header:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = 
  	{
    "action": ""
  }
  let variable = source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
      source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
      java.toast("请按照规则修改源变量，已重置源变量！")
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
    source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
  }
</js>

bookSourceComment:
--By_聆听月与悦-2025 . 3.22-15:33:41
--By_聆听月与悦-2025 . 6.28 
 -修复:
  目录乱序
  目录不全
  更换网站适配的强力搜索
  错误显示换源错误的问题

-?!?有问题跟我说

*发现的话和搜索关键字是一样的，也就是说完全可以用搜索代替
*登录不用管，我用来调试的
*在上一次的基础上修改了换源逻辑，更方便了
*书源支持修改书籍变量来实现与网站相同的换源功能，详细请看书籍详情页
*书籍变量≤c
*搜索页封面规则，选填:增加搜索时间
{{source.getKey()}}{{@@span.0@a@href}}<js>java.ajax(result)</js>{{@@class.BGsectionOne-top-left@img@src}}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
//目录的获取.解析.排序
var doc = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var html = doc.select("li.BCsectionTwo-top-chapter");
//java.log(chapters);
//var cheapers = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);

var items = [];
for ( var i = 0; i < html.size(); i++ ) {
	var cheapers = html[i];
	var usd = cheapers.select("a[data-usd]")[0];
	var cny = cheapers.select("a[data-cny]")[0];
	var dataEur = cheapers.select("li[data-eur]")[0];
 var text = String(usd.attr("data-usd"));
 var cny = String(cny.attr("data-cny"));
 var count = parseInt(dataEur.attr("data-eur"));
 var url = java.base64Decode(cny) + ",{'webView': true}";
 //java.log(url)
 var item = {
 	name: text,
 	url: url,
 	eur: count
 	};
 	items.push(item);
}

items.sort(function(a, b) {
    return a.eur - b.eur;
});

var CheaperList = [];
for (var j = 0; j < items.length; j++) {
    var chapter = items[j];
   CheaperList.push({
      CheaperName: chapter.name,
      CheaperUrl: chapter.url
    });
}
CheaperList
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p.booktag > a.red@text
ruleBookInfo.coverUrl: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p.bookintro > img.thumbnail.pull-left.visible-xs@src
ruleBookInfo.kind: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p.booktag > span.red@text
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p > a.bookchapter@text
ruleBookInfo.name: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > h1.booktitle@text
ruleBookInfo.wordCount: body > div.container > div.content > div.book.pt10 > div.bookinfo > p.booktag > span.blue.0@text

ruleSearch.author: div.bookinfo > div.author.0@text##[作者：]*
ruleSearch.bookList: body > div.container > div.content.book > div.keywords > div.bookbox > div.p10
ruleSearch.name: class.bookname@text

bookSourceComment:
*-每次搜索会随机生成一个美女视频
*-api来自互联网
*-登录设置来源
*-搜索随便搜
*-可以修改分类来源，具体看源变量
exploreUrl:
<js>
var variable = source.getVariable();
var json = JSON.parse(variable);
if (json.kind=='') {
  var kind = hot;
  } else {
  	var kind = json.kind;
  	}

ruleContent.content: var variable = source.getVariable(); var json = JSON.parse(variable); var type = json.type; var title = "video"; var url = baseUrl; if (/^http:\/\/img5\.adesk\.com\/.+/.test(url)) { content = `` } else if (title==type) { java.startBrowser(`data:text/html;charset=utf-8,${title}`, chapter.title) java.toast('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待') content = `如果视频未加载，点击右上角刷新播放视频\n当前视频直链为：\n${url}` } else { content = `` }

ruleSearch.name: name

variableComment:
修改下面的kind可以修改分类来源
hot：热门
new：最新
请勿修改其他值

ruleBookInfo.author: $.author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var book_id = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
//java.log(book_id);
var url = getHost() + "/topic/novel?topic_id=" + book_id;
var info = java.ajax(url);
info
</js>
$.data.topic
ruleBookInfo.name: $.title
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
var book_id = java.getString("id");
var data = {
	type: "douhua"
	};
var type = JSON.stringify(data);
var url = java.base64Encode(book_id);
var chaper = `data:;base64,${url},${type}`;
chaper
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var book_id = java.hexDecodeToString(result);
var url = getHost() + "/index.php/post/view/" + book_id + "?with_ids=1&type=read";
var content = java.ajax(url);
var json = JSON.parse(content);
var vip = json.data.detail.need_pay;
//java.log(vip)
var isVIP = "true";
var noVIP = "false";
if (vip==false) {
	var Content = json.data.detail.content;
	} else {
	var text = json.data.detail.des;
	var mesage = "本章为VIP章节，请购买后阅读！";
	var mes = "本章为会员章节，请登录并购买！！";
	var Content = `${mesage}\n【试读：】\n${text}`;
	java.toast(mes);
	}
Content
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
var api = getHost();
var page = (page-1)*20;
var action = "/search/content?keyword=" + key + "&start=" + page + "&rows=20&types=18&order=&is_finished=&vip=&single_page=0";
var url = api + action;
url
</js>
